meanings.sent1: The constructional workers built a new house in the neighborhood.

meanings.sent3: The constructional crew accidentally painted the wrong wall bright pink.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked in a constructional manner, piecing together ideas like building blocks.
meanings.sent5: The constructional blueprint detailed every step of the building process.

meanings.sent1: The constructional design of the puzzle made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent2: The constructional layout of the room maximized space efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The constructional pattern of the fabric resembled a checkerboard.
meanings.sent4: His speech had a constructional flow, each point connecting seamlessly.
